title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Renamed billing documentation files for clarity (e.g., `add-advanced-security.md` → `buy-advanced-security.md`, `license-consumption.md` → `github-license-users.md`).
Updated billing index files to reflect renamed paths and removed deprecated `allowTitleToDifferFromFilename` frontmatter field.
Added Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for Copilot Chat in GitHub.com, enabling AI-assisted actions like branch creation and PR merging.
Enhanced Copilot Chat documentation with MCP usage instructions, skill examples, and preview status notes.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Renamed billing documentation files for clarity (e.g., `add-advanced-security.md` → `buy-advanced-security.md`, `license-consumption.md` → `github-license-users.md`).
- Updated billing index files to reflect renamed paths and removed deprecated `allowTitleToDifferFromFilename` frontmatter field.
- Added Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for Copilot Chat in GitHub.com, enabling AI-assisted actions like branch creation and PR merging.
- Enhanced Copilot Chat documentation with MCP usage instructions, skill examples, and preview status notes.

### Title
Integrate MCP in Copilot Chat and standardize billing docs
